formsPage.pageExitWarningMessage: Do you really want to cancel your job application?

privacyPage.readPrivacyMessage: Before we can get started: During the application process, you need toenter some private information. Because of this, please read the Privacy Policy.
privacyPage.agreePrivacyMessage: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy.
privacyPage.dummyText: This is the text of the Privacy Policy

applicantsPage.finalizedByHrMessage: {{finalizedCount}} applications has been finalized by HR staff to be sent to HR monitor.
applicantsPage.yetToRateMessage: This list includes all the applications that have been submitted by the applicant but not been rated by HR staff.
applicantsPage.noApplicantsMessage: No application is submitted or finalized

applicantsUploadPage.nApplicationUploadedSuccessMessage: {{uploadedSize}} application has successfully been uploaded to the server.
applicantsUploadPage.serverConnectionErrorMessage: Cannot connect to server at the moment. Please try again later.
applicantsUploadPage.nApplicantsFailedToUploadMessage: {{failedCount}} application could not be saved due to {{errorMessage}} . Please try again later.

ratingPage.finalizeConfirmationMessage: Do you really want to finalize this form? It wont be possible to edit later.
ratingPage.finalizeApplicantMessage: All the information about the applicant is taken. You need to finalize this form to send data to the HR monitor and it will not be possible to edit information later.
ratingPage.fillRequiredFieldsToFinalizeMessage: You can finalize this form as soon as you fill all the required fields. By opening the right menu, you can see where you still need to fill the form.
ratingPage.addImpressionMessage: Please write a few lines about your personal impression on the applicant. Also, if you want to add/mention anything else you can do it here.

basicInfo.enterNameMessage: So that we can get to know you better, please provide your first and last name.
basicInfo.title: Title

contactInfo.fillContactInfoMessage: So that we can get in touch with you, please fill out the following contact information fields.
